TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RightMargin extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Math.TwipsMeasureType

Docs.summary: Right Margin. When the object is serialized out as xml, its qualified name is m:rMargin.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)] **rMargin (Right Margin)** This element specifies the right margin for math, in twips. If this element is omitted, no right margin is used. In other words, when the element is absent, the default value of the option is *0*. When the element is present and the val attribute is absent, the default of the val attribute is *1440* (or 1 inch).Math margins are added to the paragraph settings for margins. If the sum of lMargin and rMargin exceed the width available, lMargin should be ignored. If rMargin exceeds the width available, a default indent of 1440 twips should be used. [*Example*: The following XML demonstrates an rmargin setting of 1". ```xml ``` *end example*] |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |mathPr (§22.1.2.62)| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |val (Value)|Specifies the value, in twips, of the parent element.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the *ST_TwipsMeasure* simple type (§22.9.2.14).| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_TwipsMeasure) is located in §A.6.1. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]
